channel.title: How to make massing away? and chanse max hits melee/range/mage
channel.description:
1. what is the code that i can chanse the massing so you wont see/hit 3 hits at the same time or something like that?
can someone give me the code or just tell me what i need to chanse?
2. how can i chanse the max hits? the max hits of range melee and mage or cant i chanse the mage??? :S
please someone help me ;D

item.title: How to make massing away? and chanse max hits melee/range/mage
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

I know for mage it should be something like hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(40); 10 would be the lowest and 40 the highest hit, it picks something between those 2 numbers.

Read full topic
